=== Summary ===

The ubuntu-server-ec2-testing project provides an automated framework that can be run from both the command line and from CI environment such as Jenkins to test the Ubuntu Server Amazon Machine Images that are published for using in Amazon ec2 on a daily basis.

Tests can be configured to run against multiple regions, availability zones and for all instance types and root storage options using simple yaml configuration files.
